testcase.name: User can search with “Google Search”
testcase.failure:
Given I’m on the homepage...................................................passed When I type "The name of the wind" into the search field....................passed And I click the Google Search button........................................passed Then I go to the search results page........................................passed And the first result is "The Name of the Wind - Patrick Rothfuss"...........failed When I click on the first result link of result.............................skipped Then I go to the "Patrick Rothfuss - The Books" page........................skipped

testcase.name: User can search by using the suggestions
testcase.failure:
Given I’m on the homepage...................................................passed When I type "The name of the w" into the search field now...................passed And the suggestions list is displayed.......................................passed And I click on the first suggestion in the list.............................passed Then I go to the search results page........................................passed And the first result must be "The Name of the Wind - Patrick Rothfuss"......failed When I click on the first result link.......................................skipped Then I go to the "Patrick Rothfuss - The Books" page now....................skipped
